Specimen Type: EDTA whole blood or extracted DNA
Purpose: To perform full gene analysis of CYP21A2, including amplification, sequencing, and interpretation of genetic variants.
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for whole blood or appropriately labeled microcentrifuge tube for extracted DNA
Equipment: Thermocycler, microcentrifuge, DNA sequencing instrument (e.g., Sanger sequencer), electrophoresis apparatus
